resources.string:
1.On your Safaricom phone go the M-PESA menu

 2.Select Lipa Na M-PESA and then select Buy Goods and Services.

3.Enter the Till Number 768220.

 4. Enter the Amount Ksh. 50 (1 Day)/Ksh. 700 (1 Week)/Ksh. 1,000 (1 MONTH).

 5. Follow subsequent prompts to complete the transaction.

 6. You will receive a confirmation of the transaction via SMS.with USERNAME and PASSWORD Within minutes

 7. Login to your megabetingtips account and activate your plan

 8.By registering you agree to our terms and conditions .

Select Your Subscription Method
 Note: You Can Change Your Subscription Latter
